title: WCAS COG_SCI 207-0-20 Introduction to Cognitive Modeling

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An introduction to artificial intelligence and cognitive science from a non-technical perspective. This course will examine fundamental questions about thinking, beliefs, language understanding, education, and creativity in class discussion. No programming is required.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Students must write a short essay on each week's topic.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: There will be a midterm and a second non-cumulative exam during the last week of class instead of a final exam. Homework assignments will be weekly.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: No required reading determined as yet. Readings will be assigned as required. There is no textbook for this course. We will be distributing papers from the literature via our course management system.

subject: COG_SCI
